name: Sword and Shield
description:
Sword and Shield is Cooperative 2D arcade style shooter. One player plays as Sword, a red robotic sword that Shoots lasers to blast enemies. The other player is Shield, a Blue Robot who uses their large body to block project tiles. Together, they must work together to combat and endless swarm of enemies for as long as they can.

Together, how long can you last?

Music: Paradisus Paradoxum 8-bit NES VRC6 Remix by Musikage
